fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Grant a player any immunity.
- (Rehearsal) Recruit a new singer to the chorus, then rehearse.
- (Concert) Deal an attack to a player as many times as you have singers.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**- Rehearsal Radius: # of singers**
- Your main ability may be used as many times per night as you have singers. You start with 1, which is yourself.
- The host has the right to reject any immunities you are trying to grant, such as death immunity.
- That said, the host may also allow any immunity, such as death immunity, but if that happens, that's their fault, not mine.
- (Concert) You do not do 4 different attacks, you attack the same person 4 times. This example is if you have 4 singers. If you would die attacking someone, a singer will instead.
